messages.subject: Announcement: New Arrival Books

messages.messageBody:
[Japanese Sword Books]
Advanced Notice of New Arrivals
Either back in stock or new offerings, there are 18 new Nihonto titles
on our shelves, and a dozen or more tosogu titles also on view. As a
special service we bring you this notice in advance of posting these
additions to our website. Our inventory changes quickly - especially
the many popular out-of-print titles that we carry where stock is
limited.

Full descriptions with photographs and prices are listed at
http://www.satcho.com/August2006 <http://www.satcho.com/August2006>



We will be in attendance at the:

Contact: John Prough

Thank you for your time and consideration.
